title: Rare-to-market spacious and sunny 3-br single house
posting_body: This is a rare opportunity to get into a recently-updated single family home which has not been on the market for a long time.

Wonderful location in Brighton's Oak Square, walk score of 86, Boston College, Harvard Business School, Boston University, St. Elizabeth's Medical Center and much more within less than 20 minutes on a bicycle, most of Cambridge and Boston's Back Bay within less than 20 minutes driving even during rush hour (all info from walkscore dot com), on a quiet side street.

The house itself is a 3-bedroom, 2.5 bath, 1,469 square feet, open and spacious design with large windows and french doors to the back yard, as well as a partially finished basement which can double as a guest room and/or playroom.
One off-street parking spot is included (the former garage had been enclosed to make even more space).
Includes modern amenities such as in-sink garbage disposal, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances (refrigerator less than one-year-old), washer/dryer and more.
Peaceful backyard patio with table and chairs plus grill and smoker.
